name: Add subscription from multiple Jira instances

inline.description:
1. Connect the test user to 2 instances ex Instance A and Instance B
2. Create subscription webhooks in both Jira instances that are pointed at your Mattermost Server
inline.expectedResult: Test user is connected to 2 Jira instances which have webhooks configured

inline.description:
1. Ensure the user is a system admin
2. Type /jira subscribe edit
3. Click add 
4. Create a subscription that delivers events form Jira Instance A
5. Create a subscription that delivers events form Jira Instance B

1. Login Jira Instance A 
2. Create or update an issue such that the subscription created in step 3. will deliver an event.
inline.expectedResult: The event is delivered to the channel where the subscription was created

inline.description:
1. Login Jira Instance B 
2. Create or update an issue such that the subscription created in step 3. will deliver an event.
inline.expectedResult: The event is delivered to the channel where the subscription was created
